definition: to want to/to feel like/to fancy/to care for sb/desirous of
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: I need some water to quench .
Why do they want all of this stuff?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼他們想要以上這些東西？

sentences.english: We want someone for the job who has lots of pizzazz .
sentences.chinese: 我們想要有生氣的人幹這項工作。

sentences.english: "We wanted to take that experience back to Europe, " Gentz said.
sentences.chinese: “我們想要把這些經驗帶回歐洲，”根茨說。

sentences.english: I'm looking for a jacket. I'd like one with a bag.
sentences.chinese: 我正在找一件夾克，我想要件帶兜的。

sentences.english: Any processing you would like to do on session variables.
sentences.chinese: 可以對會話變量做任何你想要的處理。

sentences.english: But there is more to writing a good cover letter.
sentences.chinese: 但是想要寫出一封精彩的求職信遠沒有這麼簡單。

sentences.english: Perhaps you can explain why the Dustmen want me dead.
sentences.chinese: 也許你能解釋死亡者想要殺死我的原因。

sentences.english: No one wanted detainees ” the special-operations officer told me.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人想要的是囚犯，”這個特戰官員告訴我。

sentences.english: I want to keep that trust.
This is good, since you want to substitute values from files instead.
sentences.chinese: 這樣很好，因爲您想要用來自文件的替換值來代替。

sentences.english: Palmer knows that Drazen is holding Kimberly and wants him dead.
sentences.chinese: 帕默知道德拉贊一夥捉住了金姆，並且想要他的命。

sentences.english: That is, to bear the fruit the vine wishes to bring forth.
sentences.chinese: 這個目標就是要結出葡萄樹想要結的果子來。

sentences.english: I always want to go to  Spain.
sentences.chinese: 我一直想要去西班牙呢。

sentences.english: All you have to do is start pushing things in the direction you desire.
sentences.chinese: 你要做的就是促使事情像你想要的方向發展。

definition: to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to be capable of/to be able to/can

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
